title: Black Butterflies (Full Movie) Biopic l Drama l Romance

sources.title: Black Butterflies (Full Movie) Biopic l Drama l Romance
sources.description:
Award-winning biopic about poet Ingrid Jonker, regarded as South Africa's Sylvia Plath, as she finds her freedom in the height of 1960's Apartheid by scripting verse amidst a series of stormy love affairs.

Directed by Paula Van Der Oest
2012
Starring: Carice Van Houten, Rutger Hauer, Liam Cunningham

Edited for YouTube ad standards
